items.sentence: The police caught the suicide bomber before he could detonate his bomb.
The police have been searching for the stolen goods for almost a month.
I wouldn\'t want Tom to think we\'re not taking his proposal seriously.
I was surprised when Tom said he was applying for a job at our company.
Tom shouted Mary\'s name as loud as he could, but she didn\'t hear him.
Tom heard gunshots and looked out the window to see what was happening.
Tom is the captain of the soccer team and is also on the baseball team.
Tom knew that many of the cars in the parking lot belonged to students.
Tom knew that Mary was likely to not be ready when he got to her house.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary why he didn\'t want her to go to Boston with him.
